creator: michael@cosby.dhs.org
text:
The setRenderer() method doesn't create a renderer for RTF or MIF output types 
(it just sets rendererType), and run() checks if a renderer has been created 
(rather than checking redererType) to see if it should instantiate the defeault 
renderer. This patch fixes that by making run() check the rendererType to see 
if it has been set before defaulting to PDF.

Created attachment 7889
patch to fix the issue
creator: michael@cosby.dhs.org
michael@cosby.dhs.org
text: This was found in the CVS snapshot xml-fop_20030818221413

Applied (slightly different implementation needed though).  Thanks for spotting 
this bug!  1.0 is highly unfinished however, you may have other problems with 
MIF/RTF down the line.

ViewCVS:  http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/xml-
fop/src/java/org/apache/fop/apps/Driver.java

BTW, in the future, make sure you have the order of original file--new file 
correct with the DIFF command, your patch had the changes reversed (the new 
changes were noted "-" and the old files had a "+").
creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
